q1: How long should a social media bio be?
a1: Instagram allows 150 characters, Twitter 160 characters, TikTok 80 characters. Our generator creates bios that fit within these common limits.
q2: Can I customize the generated bios?
a2: Yes, the generated bios are starting points. You can edit them after copying to make them perfectly yours.
q3: What fields should I fill in?
a3: At minimum, fill in your role and one passion/interest. The more fields you complete, the more personalized and varied your generated bios will be.
